Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: செய்யாமல் செற்றார்க்கும் இன்னாத செய்தபின்உய்யா விழுமந் தரும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: If an ascetic inflict suffering even on those who hate him, when he has not done them any evil, it will afterwards give him irretrievable sorrow.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown performing an act of unprovoked harm ('இன்னாத') against an enemy who, though hateful, had done them no prior wrong ('செய்யாமல் செற்றார்க்கும்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The moment after the act is committed ('செய்த பின்'), a terrible, inescapable doom is unleashed.
Layered_Composition.Background: A monstrous, spectral figure representing 'Irretrievable Sorrow' ('உய்யா விழுமம்') materializes from the wrongful act itself. This monster is shown shackling the perpetrator, dragging them down into a pit of endless, inescapable regret. There is no escape from this self-inflicted consequence.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Committing an unprovoked act of harm, even against an enemy, will result in an inescapable and eternal sorrow for the perpetrator.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The personification of 'Irretrievable Sorrow' as a monstrous, shackling entity is the key visual. The sorrow is not just a feeling, but a permanent, tormenting companion that one cannot escape from.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Inescapable consequence, self-inflicted doom, tragic, horrific.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The scene is lit with a dark, tragic, and hellish light. The Monster of Sorrow is a creature of pure darkness and despair, and it drags its victim out of the light and into shadow.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dynamic shot that captures the wrongful act and the immediate, terrifying appearance of the monster of sorrow.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a terrifying design for the personified Sorrow.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic, high-contrast lighting to create a mood of horror.

Cultural_Anchors: Doing evil to a hater who has done you no evil (செய்யாமல் செற்றார்க்கும் இன்னாத செய்தல்)
Will give you un-escapable sorrow (உய்யா விழுமம் தரும்)
